ModMetaData.name: Children of Arrakis
ModMetaData.author: Arrakis Mod Team
ModMetaData.description: Dune-inspired RimWorld overhaul scaffolding for Arrakis: biome, hydration, windtraps, stillsuits, spice, and worms. Placeholder content only; fill in Defs, patches, textures, and assemblies per ROADMAP/TASKS.
